column4: As we continue our recovery from COVID-19, it is more important than ever to support small businesses. In Congress, I will continue to advocate for their needs, ensuring they are well-positioned to safely reopen, create jobs and reignite our economy. https://t.co/us2wv5FKJv

It is being reported that Speaker Pelosi will not accept any COVID-19 relief proposal that contains liability protections, which are essential for higher education institutions and small businesses. She is prioritizing special interest groups over the American people.

(2/4) On 1/30, they reversed that statement by declaring a global health emergency, meaning they expected the virus would expand beyond Chinese borders. On 1/31, @realDonaldTrump imposed travel restrictions from China. Later that day, @SpeakerPelosi called them "un-American."

(1/4) Even on Easter Sunday, the mainstream media was trying to convince the public that @realDonaldTrump is to blame for #COVID19. The facts tell a different story. On 1/23, the @who said #COVID19 was "not a global health threat."
